channel.title: CVE Feed for ipushpull -- Live updates from Excel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ipushpull -- Live updates from Excel

item.title: CVE-2023-5116|2024-08-02T07:44:53.711Z -- ipushpull -- live%20updates%20from%20excel
item.description: The Live updates from Excel plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'ipushpull_page' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 2.3.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
